Title: Vulnerable OpenSSL included in sgx-dcap-quote-verify-python
Description: sgx-dcap-quote-verify-python includes a statically linked copy of OpenSSL. The version of OpenSSL included in sgx-dcap-quote-verify-python 0.0.1..0.0.2 is vulnerable to a security issue. More details about the OpenSSL vulnerabilities themselves can be found at https://www.openssl.org/news/secadv/20230207.txt.
